text: I have to admit, I am feeling a bit of pressure from the perceived risk that someone hammers in one heck of a hack for v1.6.0 that I will then have to dissect. '^^

elements.text: I have to admit, I am feeling a bit of pressure from the perceived risk that someone hammers in one heck of a hack for v1.6.0 that I will then have to dissect. '^^

text: (person from the linked issue here) heh, I might make something ugly for personal use but I won't put it in Nixpkgs

elements.text: (person from the linked issue here) heh, I might make something ugly for personal use but I won't put it in Nixpkgs

text: It is always ugly at first just to get it to work, something is better than nothing, no? =) Do share it and we can gradually progress towards finally getting v1.6.0 into Nixpkgs. My only concern at the moment is if there is a cut off for 21.03. '^^

root.text: I have to admit, I am feeling a bit of pressure from the perceived risk that someone hammers in one heck of a hack for v1.6.0 that I will then have to dissect. '^^

elements.text: I have to admit, I am feeling a bit of pressure from the perceived risk that someone hammers in one heck of a hack for v1.6.0 that I will then have to dissect. '^^

It is always ugly at first just to get it to work, something is better than nothing, no? =) Do share it and we can gradually progress towards finally getting v1.6.0 into Nixpkgs. My only concern at the moment is if there is a cut off for 21.03. '^^
